text:
Marion Ramsey (May 10, 1947 – January 7, 2021) was an American actress and singer. She was known for her role in "Cos" and as Officer Laverne Hooks in the "Police Academy" movies. She also starred in "Lavalantula" and "2 Lava 2 Lantula!".
Ramsey died on January 7, 2021 in Los Angeles at the age of 73.
